name: Getting Things Done - Figma Design System
description:
Work faster without compromising quality!


We're glad to announce the launching of the newest free Figma Design System in the world. Simple, modern, and clean.


Meet the powerful Design System for Figma based on the most promising React UI library - Chakra UI.


We're in the Beta version with quick updates and new features. Feel free to share your feedback and help us build the best Design System that you ever need.


Stay up to date with the roadmap progress, changelog changes, and announcements. Follow our work through our newsletter. ✨


--- Subscribe here --- 



This Design System is perfect for:


  • Freelance Designers — Deliver high-quality projects faster, take on more clients and increase your income.


  • Design Teams — Get everyone on the same page with a single library. Design faster consistently.


  • Beginners & Students — Explore how the professional design system is built and get better at designing & prototyping.


  • Entrepreneurs — Short on time or budget? Design and prototype faster, with a single and consistent design system library. Save hundreds of hours on your best ideas.


What are you waiting for?

Getting Things Done is free. Follow our work through our newsletter. ✨
